Notes: a sheet made out of plexiglass
wiring to connect electrical parts to power
bearings for the velcro conveyor to roll
a heatpad to increase humity in the unit
Vibration motors to make the CaCO3 fall off the velcro once it's ready
Batteries to power the five vibrating motors (every rotation interval) and the heatpad (constantly)
glue to stick the HS-311 Servo to the conveyor wheel
drillbit used to pierce holes for the bearings an water inlet in the plexiglass
funnel and pipes used to fill the Cyan unit with water
